amendment.description: To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Marine Corps Reserve, up to $3,500,000 for the Individual First Aid Kit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4821 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4821 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S8674-8675; text: CR S8674) To make available from Operation and Maintenance, Marine Corps Reserve, up to $3,500,000 for the Individual First Aid Kit.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4821 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4821 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
